entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
